Class PhaseViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • domain.PhaseViewModel

  • public class PhaseViewModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class extends the Observable class and keeps a track of all the Observers.
    Author:
    karanbhalla

      private java.lang.String phaseInfo
      Holds information regarding what is going on in this phase.
